Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Protective Agent/Chemoprotective Agent/Cytoprotective Agent/IH636 Grape Seed Proanthocyanidin Extract,/NCIThesaurus/Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Adjuvant/Cardiovascular Agent/IH636 Grape Seed Proanthocyanidin Extract
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An oligomeric proanthocyanidin extracted from grape seeds. IH636 grape seed proanthocyanidin extract exhibits dose-dependent free-radical scavenging and antioxidant properties.
